title: Uprooted, Ep. 2: Youth Lost to a Revolution
description: When Fidel Castro took control of Cuba in 1959, some feared the shift to communism and left almost right away. Decades later, the changes brought on by the revolution would also lead to almost 15,000 Cuban refugees coming to Wisconsin as part of the Mariel Boatlift of 1980.
author: web-team@wpr.org (Wisconsin Public Radio)
category: Culture, History, North American History, Justice, Social Issues, Immigration, Latino, Race
